FWERROR Struct Reference
[Common Interfaces]

import "common.idl";

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The FreeWill+ Error Descriptor.

Definition at line 485 of file common.idl.

Public Attributes

HRESULT nCode
 The error code.

FWSTRING pMessage
 Full error message (formatted if applicable).

FWULONG nSeverity
 Severity Level: see FW_SEVERITY.

FWSTRING pClassName
 Name of the class which generated the error (see IFWUnknown::ClassId).

FWULONG nRTCId
 RunTime Id of the class which generated the error (see IFWUnknown::RTCId).

IFWUnknown * pSender
 Sender of the error info (guaranteed valid only for immediate error handlers).

FWSTRING pSrcFile
 Source file where the error occurred (or NULL if unknown).

FWULONG nSrcLine
 Source line number where the error occurred (or NULL if unknown).

FWERROR * pPrev
 Link to the previous error. This forms a double list that may be treated as the system log.

FWERROR * pNext
 Link to the next error. This forms a double list that may be treated as the system log.
